description: This file defines a Java class `MockElectricalMeasurementCluster` which extends `MockCluster`. It serves to mock or simulate the electrical measurement cluster in a Zigbee device, providing methods to set and get power measurements in watts, and to generate attribute data for testing purposes.

classes.name: MockElectricalMeasurementCluster
classes.description: A mock class representing the electrical measurement cluster of a device, allowing to simulate electrical attributes such as power for testing.

methods.name: MockElectricalMeasurementCluster
methods.description: Constructor initializing the cluster with specific attributes.

methods.name: setWatts
methods.description: Sets the active power in watts and updates the attribute report.

methods.name: getWatts
methods.description: Returns the current active power in watts.

methods.name: getMyBytes
methods.description: Converts a 16-bit integer into a byte array with little-endian order.

methods.name: getAttributeData
methods.description: Overrides method to provide attribute data for active power, multiplier, and divisor.
